article_text:
Garmin Ltd. reported disappointing results for the first quarter, as revenue was flat despite surging sales of fitness items like activity trackers.

In recent years, Garmin’s business of providing stand-alone global positioning systems had been hit by increasingly sophisticated smartphone applications. Last July, the company’s board approved a...
